name: TestJSONPlanInExplain
cases: explain format = tidb_json update t2 set id = 1 where id =2
explain format = tidb_json insert into t1 values(1)
explain format = tidb_json select count(*) from t1
explain format = tidb_json select * from t1
explain analyze format = tidb_json select * from t1, t2 where t1.id = t2.id
